festivals.name: Sunshine Beats Festival
festivals.description: A coastal celebration of music, surf, and sun. Featuring indie and electronic acts.

festivals.name: Harvest Moon Fair
festivals.description: Celebrate the fall equinox with farm-to-table food, craft vendors, and live folk music.

festivals.name: GlowFest
festivals.description: A nighttime festival of neon art, food trucks, and live DJs under the stars.

festivals.name: Aurora Lights Festival
festivals.description: Experience the northern lights with immersive light installations and winter activities.

festivals.name: Rainforest Rhythms
festivals.description: Tropical celebration of Polynesian culture, dance, and traditional drumming.

festivals.name: Steel City Soundwave
festivals.description: An industrial-meets-urban music and street art experience.

festivals.name: Blizzard Bash
festivals.description: A winter music fest featuring rock and alternative bands performing in snow domes.

festivals.name: Desert Bloom Fest
festivals.description: A desert retreat for acoustic, soul, and yoga lovers.

festivals.name: Neon Jazz Nights
festivals.description: An immersive jazz event with neon visuals and late-night jam sessions.

festivals.name: Future Fusion Fest
festivals.description: A sci-fi themed festival with synthwave music and digital art exhibitions.

festivals.name: Hogwarts Enchanted Gathering
festivals.description: Step into the wizarding world with themed music, costumes, butterbeer, wand duels, and a magical atmosphere inspired by the Harry Potter universe.
